resources.string:
Steps to use this app:
 0. Make sure your HUE stuff is set (and IP/API hardcoded in this app's main activity)
 1. Pair your band with the phone
 2. Make sure Microsoft Health is installed
 3. Press the Start button
 4. Press the Stop button to end the demo and remove the tile.
 5. Make sure you set up the Hue CLIP sensor and rules
 6. Nag or help me make this app run in background instead of popping up all the time!
